Package simulation.gui

Interface Summary
CameraListener This listener is notified when the camera is zoomed or moved.
 

Class Summary
AboutWindow  
AnimationTask This class represents each frame of the simulation when it is playing.
CameraEvent Represents the change in the camera -- either in the zoom or position (offset) of the view.
CameraMap  
ColorButton This is a button that shows a color in a square.
DefaultsEditor This is a window that lets users edit the defaults of shape creation like the default density which dictates the created object's mass, the default friction and the default bounciness.
Main A 2D shape collision simulation with a Swing GUI; it presents a large amount of options to the user, letting the user specify circles, rectangles or any custom irregular polygon.
MainWindow This is the main window of the simulation; it contains the main display, and while not necessarily encompassing everything -- there can be some independent frames -- it is the window that is opened first.
PolygonPad This class is used to create dialogs for the creation of custom polygons.
ShapeExplorer This class is a window that lets the user browse through a list of bodies in the simulation and edit some of their properties like mass or color.
ShapeNode This is a specialized tree node that represents a body in the simulation.
ShapeNodeRenderer This class renders the ShapeNodes that make up the list part of the ShapeExplorer.
ShapeTracker A panel that shows a view of the simulation centered on the specified body.
ShapeView This class displays some information about a body, including a picture.
SimulationMenu This is the menu on the side of the simulation; it contains various options and buttons, particularly the play/step/pause commands.
SimulationStatusBar Displays some rudimentary information on the bottom of the screen for the simulation.
SimulationToolBar A toolbar for the simulation.
SimulationView This is the main view which shows a visual representation of the simulation.
TrackWindow  
ViewPanel A panel with a light logo in the background.
WatermarkedPanel A panel that has the logo and its reflection near the middle.
